Name: The Sailor's Treasure
Description: Not all treasure of the sea is left behind by pirates, some could have been left by ordinary sailors... or a captain.
QuestDesc: Not all treasure of the sea is left behind by pirates, some could have been left by ordinary sailors... or a captain.

Dialogues.Speaker: Toretto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Acolyte? Back again so soon?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mr. Toretto, we're here to learn more about the "Sailor's Treasure."

Dialogues.Speaker: Toretto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since when did the Order start caring about treasure?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Err. No, actually...

Dialogues.Speaker: Toretto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, spare me the details! Treasure hunters come and go, you lot are a dime a dozen. You'll end up empty-handed like the rest of 'em anyway.

Options.PlotLineKey: Maybe we'll find it. You never know.

Dialogues.Speaker: Toretto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Awfully sure of yourself, aren't ya? You know how long ago the Age of a Thousand Islands was. Besides that old legend, there's not a sliver of evidence proving any of it is true.

Dialogues.Speaker: Toretto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Without real clues, it's just a wild goose chase. The islands have already been turned upside down by those treasure hunters, and not a single coin has been found.

Options.PlotLineKey: Are there any other stories about the sailor?

Dialogues.Speaker: Toretto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Other stories, you ask? Lemme see... There's the Wandering Gondola. Or there's the Master of the Fish King...

Options.PlotLineKey: Tell us about the Wandering Gondola.
Tell us about the Master of the Fish King.
I don't have any more to ask.

Dialogues.Speaker: Toretto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Legend has it a sailor arrived here in a Gondola. Even after he disappeared, it still drifts among these islands waiting for his return.

Dialogues.Speaker: Toretto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Fish King is a notorious foe for any fisherman. Legend claims that once a sailor caught one in these very waters.

Dialogues.Speaker: Toretto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No one has caught one since. They say a Fish King only heeds the call of someone as great as that sailor.

Dialogues.Speaker: Toretto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All right, you already know what you need to know. Off you go, then. I'll be watching to see if you can find that treasure, ha!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Phoebe attempts to communicate with the Echo and decipher what it's saying.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They seems to know something! It may be trying to guide us in a certain direction... Shall we go take a look?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ahab
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, well met, friends! What's this ye've got there?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Phoebe shares the story of your treasure hunt with Ahab and shows him the chest with the inscriptions.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ahab
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, ye're telling me this here chest is from that legendary sailor?! Let me have a look.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ahab
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... there's a seal coverin' up these inscriptions. Can't get a good look at 'em. Heh, but watch me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahab searches the surrounding area and returns with a unique plant. He squeezes it to extract its sap and applies it to the chest. Almost immediately, the inscriptions become clear.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ahab
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: See that? It's an old trick we used to write hidden messages. Now we can read what it says.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ahab
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "No victory is instant. The truth must be pieced together bit by bit."

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It seems like... we need to gather the rest of this map to find the treasure.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's keep our eyes peeled from now on, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ahab
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I wonder what that sailor left behind. Endless riches? Ancient relics?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Or perhaps... a Fish King?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ahab
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? Hahaha. Never thought I'd hear that from an Acolyte!

Options.PlotLineKey: Thanks, Ahab. We'll make sure to share the treasure with you once we find it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ahab
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's mighty generous, but I'm content with me lot in life. Whatever you find, keep it for yerselves!

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I never expected to actually find something... This appears to be...

Options.PlotLineKey: Looks like a treasure map. A piece of one at least.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There looks to be something inscribed inside the chest. Hmm... It's hard to make out. The script is unfamiliar to me.

Options.PlotLineKey: Let's ask a reliable local for advice.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I heard a fascinating tale while we've been here, {PlayerName}. Would you care to listen?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's a fishermen's legend passed down for generations on this island. It speaks of Rinascita during the ancient Age of a Thousand Islands, when the Riccioli Islands were ruled by a sailor driven from his homeland.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This sailor possessed untold riches, yet no one knew the source of his fortune.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He used his vast wealth to build a citadel that brought peace and prosperity to the people of the land.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just when they prepared to build a monument to honor him, he vanished without a trace.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whispers claimed he sailed away to seek revenge for a dark past.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Before he departed, he left behind his most cherished treasures on these islands and set forth on a path of revenge, never to return.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm curious what kind of treasure a man like that would leave behind. It must've held great significance to him.

Options.PlotLineKey: Shall we set out to uncover it?
I can hear the treasure calling to me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I knew you'd be intrigued! Perhaps we could seek out someone well-versed in these legends? They may hold the key to our quest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ahab's Note
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Someone has surely found that legendary sailor's treasure by now."

Dialogues.Speaker: Ahab's Note
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "If you can't see it, just try squeezing some waterweed juice onto it."

Dialogues.Speaker: Ahab's Note
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "What? Any waterweed will do. Do you think a sailor has time to be choosy?"

Dialogues.Speaker: Ahab's Note
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "No victory is instant. The truth must be pieced together bit by bit."

Dialogues.Speaker: Ahab's Note
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Search for all the scraps of that treasure map. Piece it together, and who knows what you might discover?"
